results.title: Metabolic effects of controlled-release metoprolol in hypertensive men with impaired or diabetic glucose tolerance: a comparison with atenolol.
results.text_hl: Metabolic effects of controlled-release @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired or diabetic glucose tolerance@@@: a comparison with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Fagerberg B, Berglund A, Holme E, Wilhelmsen L, Elmfeldt D. Metabolic effects of controlled-release metoprolol in hypertensive men with impaired or diabetic glucose tolerance: a comparison with atenolol. J Intern Med. 1990 Jan;227(1):37-43. PMID: 2405089

results.title: Melatonin Pathway and Atenolol-Related Glucose Dysregulation: Is There a Correlation?
results.text_hl: Lower @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ level, melatonin receptor gene variations, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment are associated with @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@glucose dysregulation@@@.

citations.NLM: Chang SW, Gong Y, McDonough CW, Langaee TY, Nasiri Kenari N, Beitelshees AL, Gums JG, Chapman AB, Turner ST, Johnson JA, Cooper-DeHoff RM. Melatonin Pathway and Atenolol-Related Glucose Dysregulation: Is There a Correlation? Clin Transl Sci. 2016 Apr;9(2):114-22. PMID: 26946962

results.title: Effects of nebivolol and atenolol on insulin sensitivity and haemodynamics in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: To compare the effects of @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in 25 ambulatory @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@.

citations.NLM: Poirier L, Cléroux J, Nadeau A, Lacourcière Y. Effects of nebivolol and atenolol on insulin sensitivity and haemodynamics in hypertensive patients. J Hypertens. 2001 Aug;19(8):1429-35. PMID: 11518851

results.title: [A clinical intervention study among 463 essential hypertensive patients with metabolic syndrome].
results.journal: Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi
results.text_hl: Two of the three components (1) increased waist circumference and/or BMI; (2) increased @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@TG@@@) and/or decreased high-density lipoprotein cholesterol; (3) @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@IGT@@@) were present define the @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MS@@@.

citations.NLM: Guo JZ, Gong YC, Zhang JL, Qing YW, Dai QY, Wang YC, Gao X, Ni YF. [A clinical intervention study among 463 essential hypertensive patients with metabolic syndrome]. Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi. 2005 Feb;33(2):132-6. PMID: 15924807

results.title: Effects of beta 1-selective and nonselective beta-adrenoceptor blockade during exercise conditioning in healthy adults.
results.text_hl: Subjects who received @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, but not those who received @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or placebo, showed an acutely @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired exercise tolerance@@@ after drug administration but before training (-8 +/- 4%, p less than 0.05).

citations.NLM: McLeod AA, Kraus WE, Williams RS. Effects of beta 1-selective and nonselective beta-adrenoceptor blockade during exercise conditioning in healthy adults. Am J Cardiol. 1984 Jun 1;53(11):1656-61. PMID: 6375340
citations.BibTeX: @article{6375340, title={Effects of beta 1-selective and nonselective beta-adrenoceptor blockade during exercise conditioning in healthy adults.}, author={McLeod AA and Kraus WE and Williams RS}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={53}, number={11}, pages={1656-61}}
